title: Duel Monitor Problem
body:
Problem:

I will start the game with friends and complete character select. After we complete character select, the game crashes and opens up stating if I want to send the error. I will switch the main screen over to the other monitor and till work perfectly fine. I tried using the one monitor (only one plugged in) that had the error before, and it still doesn't want to work on this particular screen. I tried messing with the resolution (in game and monitor settings), but it still doesn't work and keeps popping up with the error.

I was wondering if anyone had the same issue while using duel monitors.

replies.body:
Did someone say Duel monitor problem? ^.^

https://hikkichan.com/misc/src/1459190376809.png

On a real note, this is likely caused by the resolution being different between those monitors, while League tries to load up the configuration for your secondary monitor. You should be able to resolve this by completing an input file reset with the steps below:

**Log into League** then hop into your installation directory, which should be here: (**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the **CONFIG** folder inside your install directory, then hop into a custom game to see if the changes went through. Let me know if this worked for you.
Thank you! Deleting the folder worked! :) Also I love the Duel Monitor Puns lol.
